title: How to find the right mattress to ensure you get a good night's sleep
text:
In front of you are 20 different mattresses in a showroom, of varying size and colour, made by multiple manufacturers with various different materials. Over the next few years, you'll spend the best part of a third of your life (or more, or less, depending on how well you sleep) on one of these mattresses. So, which one do you choose?

Arguably, it's never been harder to answer that question. Sleep health brands have proliferated in recent years, and in doing so they've shined a bedside light on how obsessed we've become with getting a good night's sleep. The wrong mattress, we're told, can hurt your spine, make you overheat, and generally result in you walking around in a daze. Often, it seems...
